programme.title: Amor, Estúpido e Louco
programme.desc: Cal Weaver acha que tem o casamento perfeito até que Emily lhe pede o divórcio. Cal, agora solteiro, parte em busca do amor com a ajuda do perito em mulheres Jacob Palmer. Entre paixonetas e encontros, Cal e Jacob percebem que sem a pessoa certa o amor não é só estúpido e louco, é também impossível!

programme.title: A Dívida
programme.desc: Tudo começa em 1997, quando os ex-agentes secretos da Mossad, Rachel e Stephan, recebem notícias chocantes do antigo colega David. Os três foram venerados no seu país durante décadas por uma missão que levaram a cabo em 1966, quando o trio perseguiu o criminoso Nazi Vogel em Berlim de Leste.

programme.title: O Batedor
programme.desc: Um ex-especialista em sobrevivência militar e rastreador de florestas profundas une-se a um agente do FBI para caçar um assassino que os atrai para um jogo do gato e rato esgotante. Com precisão implacável e instinto para matar, o assassino está sempre um passo à frente dos que vão no seu encalço.

programme.title: #FicaEmCasa
programme.desc: Dois anos após o início da pandemia de Covid-19, um grupo de amigos faz uma festa online cheia de jogos, bebida e droga. Depois de tomarem ecstasy, as coisas começam a correr mal e as suas casas tornam-se muito mais aterrorizantes do que o mundo lá fora...

programme.title: Asher: Redenção de um Hitman
programme.desc: Asher é um hitman envelhecido que passou a maior parte da vida a eliminar outras vidas. Num último trabalho que não corre bem, Asher é confrontado com a realidade e tem que se redimir: para ser o homem que deseja ser, tem de eliminar o homem que foi.

programme.title: Noite Sangrenta
programme.desc: Na noite de 19 de outubro de 1921, um grupo de marinheiros e guardas republicanos percorre as ruas de Lisboa, na chamada Camioneta Fantasma. Várias figuras políticas e militares são assassinadas na chamada "Noite Sangrenta" e uma mulher vai tentar descobrir toda a verdade.

programme.title: Chovem Almôndegas 2 (V.O.)
programme.desc: Flint Lockwood trabalha agora com o seu ídolo Chester V e os grandes inventores do mundo! Tudo muda quando descobre que a sua máquina infame (que transforma água em comida) ainda funciona e está agora a criar animais-comida híbridos, os "comidimais"!

programme.title: Buena Vista Social Club
programme.desc: Ry Cooder viaja para Havana para reunir um grupo de músicos cubanos, cujo talento foi esquecido após o domínio de Cuba por Fidel Castro. Os músicos gravam um CD que vai ressuscitar as suas carreiras.

programme.title: Veredito Mortal
programme.desc: Laura Price começa a preocupar-se quando percebe que os membros de um júri de tribunal de que ela fez parte começam a morrer pela ordem dos números dos seus assentos. Com a ajuda do detetive Callendar, ela vai tentar desvendar o que está a provocar as mortes antes de se tornar a próxima vítima.

programme.title: O Grande Mestre dos Lutadores
programme.desc: Um jovem indisciplinado, que está sempre a meter-se em sarilhos, vai ser forçado a aprender, da forma mais dura e rigorosa, um estilo secreto de "drunken boxing" para conseguir enfrentar um assassino.

programme.title: Era Uma Vez No México
programme.desc: Sands é um peculiar agente da CIA destinado no México. Segundo ele, a sua missão é manter o equilíbrio no país. Quando descobre que Barillo planeia assassinar o Presidente através do general Marquez, vai em busca do legendário El Mariachi, que vive isolado, para que este acabe com ele.

programme.title: The International - A Organização
programme.desc: Louis Salinger, agente da Interpol, e Eleanor Whitman, assistente do procurador-geral de Manhattan, querem desmascarar as atividades ilícitas de um dos bancos mais poderosos do mundo. Seguem o dinheiro de Berlim a Nova Iorque, de Milão a Istambul, e são até obrigados a contornar as leis.

programme.title: High Moon
programme.desc: Num futuro distante, os países da Terra estabeleceram colónias na lua para explorar os recursos do satélite. Só que a descoberta de uma nova forma de vida desencadeia o caos quando várias fações competem para descobrir e explorar os seus poderosos segredos.

programme.title: Velocidade Assassina
programme.desc: Rhona troca as voltas ao seu chefe, um barão do crime de Los Angeles, que se vinga, raptando-lhe o filho e exigindo-lhe que cumpra cinco tarefas durante uma única noite, em troca da libertação do garoto.

programme.title: Promessa Sangrenta
programme.desc: Em Los Angeles, um ex-presidiário surpreende tudo e todos no mundo das competições de luta ilegais para cumprir uma promessa a um amigo morto.

programme.title: Her Smell - A Música Nas Veias
programme.desc: Uma cantora de punk rock autodestrutiva luta por se manter sóbria, enquanto tenta recuperar a inspiração e a criatividade que catapultou a sua banda para o sucesso.

programme.title: The Neon Demon - O Demónio de Néon
programme.desc: Quando a aspirante a modelo Jesse se muda para Los Angeles, a sua juventude e a sua vitalidade são devoradas por um grupo de outras mulheres, obcecadas em conseguir obter tudo o que Jesse possui.

programme.title: A Herdade
programme.desc: A saga de uma família proprietária de um dos maiores latifúndios da Europa, na margem sul do Tejo, convida-nos a mergulhar profundamente nos segredos da sua herdade. A partir dela, faz-se o retrato de Portugal, dos anos 40, atravessando a revolução do 25 de Abril e até aos dias de hoje.

programme.title: High Moon
programme.desc: Num futuro distante, os países da Terra estabeleceram colónias na lua para explorar os recursos do satélite. Só que a descoberta de uma nova forma de vida desencadeia o caos quando várias fações competem para descobrir e explorar os seus poderosos segredos.

programme.title: O Sol da Meia Noite
programme.desc: Nikolai 'Kolya' Rodchenko é um grande bailarino que desertou da União Soviética e vive nos EUA. Quando o avião em que viaja é forçado a aterrar na Sibéria, ele é repatriado à força e fica com um dançarino de sapateado americano que optou pela via comunista. Será que ele o vai ajudar a fugir?

programme.title: Casamento em Dose Dupla
programme.desc: Quando Noah é despedido do seu emprego como terapeuta, pensa que o dia não podia ter corrido pior. Mas quando chega a casa, encontra a sua superpossessiva mãe com os seus cinco cães, todos sem sítio para ficar. Para piorar, tem que lidar com a pressão da mulher que quer desesperadamente uma criança.

programme.title: Os Flintstones
programme.desc: Na vila pré-histórica de Bedrock, um operário é promovido a vice-presidente de um conglomerado industrial para servir de testa de ferro a um escroque.

programme.title: Space Jam
programme.desc: O lendário Michael Jordan concorda em ajudar os Looney Toons a disputar um jogo de basquetebol contra uma equipa de extraterrestres. O resultado irá decidir se eles ficam na Terra ou se, em vez disso, se transformam nas principais atrações de um parque de diversões intergaláctico.

programme.title: A Onda dos Sonhos
programme.desc: Anne sabe surfar e vai prová-lo! Um dia ganhará o Pipe Masters, uma das mais duras provas de surf, famosa pelo domínio masculino. Com a ajuda das suas melhores amigas, Anne concentra todas as suas energias no cumprimento dos seus sonhos. Até conhecer Matt, a única pessoa capaz de a fazer vacilar.

programme.title: Mundo Jurássico
programme.desc: Passados 22 anos, Isla Nublar transformou-se num parque temático do mundo jurássico. No entanto, depois de 10 anos de atividade, o parque entrou em declínio. É então inventada uma nova atração que vai criar novas dificuldades de grande dimensão.

programme.title: Wimbledon - Encontro Perfeito
programme.desc: Um veterano jogador de ténis participa no último torneio em Wimbledon e apaixona-se por uma jovem jogadora, apesar da oposição do pai e treinador dela.

programme.title: Peppermint
programme.desc: História de vingança centrada numa jovem mãe que não tem nada a perder, após o marido e a filha terem sido assassinados. Desta forma, Riley North decide tirar a vida aos rivais que lhe roubaram a família e vingar-se do sistema judicial que os deixou em liberdade.

programme.title: Até ao Último Combate 2
programme.desc: No interior de um colégio aparentemente normal, o definitivo duelo de luta clandestina de MMA está a ser planeado. A antiga estrela em ascensão da MMA, Case Walker, treina quatro lutadores em idade escolar, cada qual com os seus próprios obstáculos.

programme.title: Morte em Tombstone
programme.desc: Um bando cruel aterroriza uma pequena cidade mineira. Numa disputa a sangue frio pelo poder, o líder Guerrero acaba morto. Sentenciado à eternidade no Inferno, Guerrero é confrontado por Satanás, que lhe oferece uma proposta ousada: se entregar as almas do seu antigo bando, liberta-se da condenação.

programme.title: Escape
programme.desc: Carol, mulher e parceira do crime do hábil ladrão Doc McCoy, fará tudo o que for necessário para livrá-lo de uma pesada sentença numa penitenciária mexicana. Isso inclui levarem a cabo um roubo de grandes proporções, em que escapar com vida vai ser o mais difícil...

programme.title: Icarus, Máquina de Guerra
programme.desc: Edward Genn, nome de código Icarus, é um assassino treinado do KGB que trabalhou durante anos como um agente adormecido da América. No entanto, quando o Império Soviético ruiu, viu-se isolado num país estrangeiro e sem ninguém em quem confiar.

programme.title: Mune, o Guardião da Lua (V.P.)
programme.desc: Mune, o fauno, é o novo guardião da Lua. No entanto, a sua inexperiência pode pôr o Sol e a Lua em perigo. Só com ajuda dos seus amigos vai ser possível devolver a harmonia ao céu, com o Sol e a Lua em paz.

programme.title: Os Anjos de Charlie
programme.desc: O empresário Eric Knox tem em seu poder um programa informático capaz de identificar pela voz, uma aplicação que pode ser perigosa se cair nas mãos erradas. Este é um trabalho para Natalie, Dylan e Alex, que são peritas em artes marciais e nem precisam de armas para fazer frente ao inimigo!

programme.title: Os Flintstones
programme.desc: Na vila pré-histórica de Bedrock, um operário é promovido a vice-presidente de um conglomerado industrial para servir de testa de ferro a um escroque.

programme.title: A Onda dos Sonhos
programme.desc: Anne sabe surfar e vai prová-lo! Um dia ganhará o Pipe Masters, uma das mais duras provas de surf, famosa pelo domínio masculino. Com a ajuda das suas melhores amigas, Anne concentra todas as suas energias no cumprimento dos seus sonhos. Até conhecer Matt, a única pessoa capaz de a fazer vacilar.

programme.title: Wimbledon - Encontro Perfeito
programme.desc: Um veterano jogador de ténis participa no último torneio em Wimbledon e apaixona-se por uma jovem jogadora, apesar da oposição do pai e treinador dela.

programme.title: O Mundo Perdido: Jurassic Park
programme.desc: Passaram quatro anos desde a tragédia ocorrida em Parque Jurássico e dois grupos entram numa corrida contrarrelógio que determinará o destino dos habitantes pré-históricos desta ilha afastada.

programme.title: Salt
programme.desc: Quando a sua lealdade é posta em causa, Salt foge e utiliza as suas aptidões e anos de experiência como agente secreta, de modo a não ser capturada. À medida que Salt faz de tudo para provar a sua inocência, mais dúvidas se levantam, continuando assim a busca pela sua verdadeira identidade.

programme.title: Golpe Final
programme.desc: Após um grupo de terroristas raptar a sua sobrinha num jogo de futebol, um ex-soldado, com técnicas de combate fatais, inicia uma guerra para salvá-la e evitar a destruição maciça.

programme.title: Waterworld
programme.desc: Num futuro onde a Terra fica submersa e os humanos têm de se adaptar a esta nova vida, um homem tenta não morrer de fome e combate bandidos, enquanto procura um mundo mágico onde existe terra firme.

programme.title: Morte em Tombstone
programme.desc: Um bando cruel aterroriza uma pequena cidade mineira. Numa disputa a sangue frio pelo poder, o líder Guerrero acaba morto. Sentenciado à eternidade no Inferno, Guerrero é confrontado por Satanás, que lhe oferece uma proposta ousada: se entregar as almas do seu antigo bando, liberta-se da condenação.

programme.title: Fora de Alcance
programme.desc: Billy Ray Lansing, um ex-agente infiltrado que trabalha numa reserva no Alaska, troca correspondência com uma menina polaca, que também ajuda financeiramente. Quando ela desaparece, ele investiga o orfanato onde ela estava e percebe que servia de cobertura a uma rede de tráfico humano.

programme.title: Gangster Americano
programme.desc: Ninguém costumava reparar em Frank Lucas, o discreto motorista de um dos principais chefes do crime organizado em Harlem. Mas, quando o seu patrão morre subitamente, Frank aproveita a abertura na estrutura de poder para construir o seu próprio império e criar a sua versão do "Sonho Americano".

programme.title: Fruitvale Station: A Última Paragem
programme.desc: Óscar Grant acorda a 31 de dezembro de 2008 com a sensação de que algo estranho se passa. Sem certezas, toma isso como um sinal para recomeçar a sua vida e decide ser um melhor filho, um melhor namorado e um melhor pai. Baseado numa história verídica.

programme.title: Embriagado de Amor
programme.desc: Os abusos constantes das sas sete irmãs de Barry Egan mantiveram-no sozinho e incapaz de se apaixonar. Detentor de um lado negro de raiva e violência, pode estar no limite, interiormente. É então que conhece Lena Leonard, uma mulher intensamente doce, mas misteriosa, e a sua viagem romântica começa.

programme.title: Casei com uma Feiticeira
programme.desc: Isabel é uma feiticeira ingénua, determinada a desistir dos seus poderes para levar uma vida normal. Numa livraria, tudo muda quando conhece um ator disposto a relançar a sua carreira. Ele convida-a para entrar num "remake" da série "Casei com uma Feiticeira", mas mal sabe no que se meteu!

programme.title: Segurança Nacional
programme.desc: Eles têm apenas uma coisa em comum: foram rejeitados pelo Departamento de Polícia de Los Angeles! Um foi expulso e o outro nem foi admitido. Mas quando Earl e Hank se juntam como seguranças, ninguém está seguro! Juntos, mas não por opção, têm debaixo de olho o homem que matou o parceiro de Hank.

programme.title: Space Jam
programme.desc: O lendário Michael Jordan concorda em ajudar os Looney Toons a disputar um jogo de basquetebol contra uma equipa de extraterrestres. O resultado irá decidir se eles ficam na Terra ou se, em vez disso, se transformam nas principais atrações de um parque de diversões intergaláctico.

programme.title: Mr. Bean em Férias
programme.desc: Numa Inglaterra chuvosa, Mr. Bean fica delirante ao descobrir que acabou de ganhar umas magníficas férias no sul de França. Mas onde quer que vá, como seria de esperar, Mr. Bean semeia o caos e a destruição, transformando tudo numa animação. Está sempre a um passo do desastre!

programme.title: Tornado
programme.desc: Nesta turbulenta e emocionante aventura, dois cientistas enfrentam o tornado mais destrutivo da história da América nos últimos 50 anos. Não tendo forma de o deter, os cientistas procuram lançar sensores dentro do funil do tornado. Mas para o conseguir, têm que adivinhar o caminho do furacão.

programme.title: Waterworld
programme.desc: Num futuro onde a Terra fica submersa e os humanos têm de se adaptar a esta nova vida, um homem tenta não morrer de fome e combate bandidos, enquanto procura um mundo mágico onde existe terra firme.

programme.title: Reprisal: Contra-Ataque
programme.desc: Jacob Tasker testemunha um assalto ao banco onde trabalha e decide tentar apanhar o assaltante com a ajuda do seu amigo, James Richardson, um polícia reformado. Mas quando o assaltante se apercebe da situação retalia e rapta a família de Jacob...

programme.title: Aposta de Risco
programme.desc: No mundo das apostas desportivas bem altas, podem nascer fortunas ou derrotas. Quando Brandon Lang se torna o protegido do apostador Walter Abrams, dá nas vistas graças à sua impressionante capacidade de prever resultados. Agora, com milhões em jogo, encontra-se num jogo mortal com o mentor.

programme.title: Gangster Americano
programme.desc: Ninguém costumava reparar em Frank Lucas, o discreto motorista de um dos principais chefes do crime organizado em Harlem. Mas, quando o seu patrão morre subitamente, Frank aproveita a abertura na estrutura de poder para construir o seu próprio império e criar a sua versão do "Sonho Americano".

programme.title: Anjo da Morte
programme.desc: Uma assassina profissional fica assombrada por uma das suas vítimas, após um ferimento quase fatal no cérebro. Depois disso, decide vingar-se dos antigos patrões.

programme.title: Tubarão
programme.desc: Quando um tubarão-branco começa a caçar pessoas nas praias de Nova Inglaterra, o xerife Brody, um especialista em tubarões e um pescador veterano iniciam uma perigosa demanda para caçar a criatura.

programme.title: Promessa Sangrenta
programme.desc: Em Los Angeles, um ex-presidiário surpreende tudo e todos no mundo das competições de luta ilegais para cumprir uma promessa a um amigo morto.

programme.title: Tal Pai, Tal Mãe
programme.desc: Quando Florence e Vincent recebem, ao mesmo tempo, a promoção profissional há muito desejada, decidem que a sua vida de casal tem de acabar. Depois da guerra conjugal declarada, tudo o que nenhum dos dois quer é ficar com a guarda dos filhos...

programme.title: Snow: A Pedra dos Desejos (V.P.)
programme.desc: Kiara e Kai estão agora mais crescidos e o nível de sarilhos que estes gémeos criados entre trolls arranjam aumenta tambem. E desta vez, eles vão mesmo precisar da ajuda dos seus amigos...

programme.title: Mr. Bean em Férias
programme.desc: Numa Inglaterra chuvosa, Mr. Bean fica delirante ao descobrir que acabou de ganhar umas magníficas férias no sul de França. Mas onde quer que vá, como seria de esperar, Mr. Bean semeia o caos e a destruição, transformando tudo numa animação. Está sempre a um passo do desastre!

programme.title: Tornado
programme.desc: Nesta turbulenta e emocionante aventura, dois cientistas enfrentam o tornado mais destrutivo da história da América nos últimos 50 anos. Não tendo forma de o deter, os cientistas procuram lançar sensores dentro do funil do tornado. Mas para o conseguir, têm que adivinhar o caminho do furacão.

programme.title: Extremamente Perverso, Escandalosamente Cruel e Vil
programme.desc: A histórica verídica de Ted Bundy, o assassino em série mais famoso dos EUA. Bonito, inteligente e carismático, Ted vive uma vida aparentemente perfeita com Liz. Mas quando Ted é acusado de uma série de assassinatos tenebrosos, Liz tem de reavaliar tudo.

programme.title: Tubarão 2
programme.desc: O terror está longe de acabar! Os banhistas de Amity são, uma vez mais, ameaçados por um gigante tubarão devorador de pessoas. Quando sinais de um novo apreciador de carne humana começam a surgir, o xerife Brody tem de convencer a cidade do perigo que corre, assim como matar o monstro.

programme.title: Voo 93
programme.desc: O voo 93 da American Airlines foi o único dos aviões desviados que, no dia 11 de setembro de 2001, não atingiu o alvo (diz-se que seria a Casa Branca). Este é o relato em "tempo real" do que se passou no avião que acabaria por despenhar-se na Pensilvânia, graças à ação de alguns passageiros.

programme.title: Eternamente Jovem
programme.desc: Em 1939, o piloto de ensaios Daniel McCormick depara-se com a morte do amor da sua vida. Incapaz de encarar a vida sozinho, ele oferece-se como voluntário para uma experiência criogénica secreta, mas quando acorda, em 1992, a realidade que encontra é-lhe totalmente desconhecida.

programme.title: Estrada de Fogo
programme.desc: Por entre uma melancólica paisagem de rock 'n' roll, o bando de motociclistas Bombers, liderado pelo perverso Raven Shaddock, rapta a diva Ellen Aim. A esperança dela na salvação repousa em improváveis heróis: o soldado da fortuna Tom Cody e a sua companheira, a vigorosa amiga da bebida, McCoy.

programme.title: Ray
programme.desc: A história verídica do músico Ray Charles, desde a infância de pobreza até ao estrelato internacional. Nascido numa zona pobre da Geórgia, Ray ficou cego aos sete anos. Apesar disso, tornou-se um dos mais conhecidos músicos do mundo e revolucionou a música soul, o jazz, o country e o gospel.

programme.title: Tubarão
programme.desc: Quando um tubarão-branco começa a caçar pessoas nas praias de Nova Inglaterra, o xerife Brody, um especialista em tubarões e um pescador veterano iniciam uma perigosa demanda para caçar a criatura.

programme.title: Arena
programme.desc: Um sádico e empreendedor homem de negócios criou um império com o seu brutal website de gladiadores, onde se combate até à morte. O seu novo guerreiro é David Lord, um bombeiro que raptou e agora está preso e obrigado a lutar pela sua vida para comprar a sua liberdade.

programme.title: Até ao Último Combate 2
programme.desc: No interior de um colégio aparentemente normal, o definitivo duelo de luta clandestina de MMA está a ser planeado. A antiga estrela em ascensão da MMA, Case Walker, treina quatro lutadores em idade escolar, cada qual com os seus próprios obstáculos.

programme.title: Veredito Mortal
programme.desc: Laura Price começa a preocupar-se quando percebe que os membros de um júri de tribunal de que ela fez parte começam a morrer pela ordem dos números dos seus assentos. Com a ajuda do detetive Callendar, ela vai tentar desvendar o que está a provocar as mortes antes de se tornar a próxima vítima.

programme.title: Ajudem as Miúdas
programme.desc: Lisa Conroy, a gerente de um "sports bar" de beira de estrada, vê testado até ao limite o seu incurável otimismo e a fé nas suas funcionárias, nos seus clientes e em si própria, ao longo de um estranho dia.

programme.title: Voo 93
programme.desc: O voo 93 da American Airlines foi o único dos aviões desviados que, no dia 11 de setembro de 2001, não atingiu o alvo (diz-se que seria a Casa Branca). Este é o relato em "tempo real" do que se passou no avião que acabaria por despenhar-se na Pensilvânia, graças à ação de alguns passageiros.

programme.title: Tubarão 2
programme.desc: O terror está longe de acabar! Os banhistas de Amity são, uma vez mais, ameaçados por um gigante tubarão devorador de pessoas. Quando sinais de um novo apreciador de carne humana começam a surgir, o xerife Brody tem de convencer a cidade do perigo que corre, assim como matar o monstro.

programme.title: A Belle Époque
programme.desc: Um casal de meia-idade vive uma crise e a separação é inevitável. Mas nem tudo está perdido... Vítor tem a oportunidade de retroceder no tempo e reviver a semana mais marcante da sua vida: aquela em que conheceu o seu grande amor, há 40 anos.

programme.title: O Herói
programme.desc: Vitório regressa da guerra. Uma guerra que durou quase três décadas, na qual entrou forçado, aos 15 anos, como soldado raso. Vitório matou gente, viu os amigos morrerem, passou fome, pisou uma mina e perdeu uma perna. Após uma lenta recuperação, Vitório tenta a sua sorte nas ruas de Luanda.

programme.title: Ray
programme.desc: A história verídica do músico Ray Charles, desde a infância de pobreza até ao estrelato internacional. Nascido numa zona pobre da Geórgia, Ray ficou cego aos sete anos. Apesar disso, tornou-se um dos mais conhecidos músicos do mundo e revolucionou a música soul, o jazz, o country e o gospel.

programme.title: Estrada de Fogo
programme.desc: Por entre uma melancólica paisagem de rock 'n' roll, o bando de motociclistas Bombers, liderado pelo perverso Raven Shaddock, rapta a diva Ellen Aim. A esperança dela na salvação repousa em improváveis heróis: o soldado da fortuna Tom Cody e a sua companheira, a vigorosa amiga da bebida, McCoy.

programme.title: Os Quebra-Ossos
programme.desc: Paul Crewe é um jogador de futebol americano que, juntamente com Nate Scarborough, treinador do mesmo género, se encontra a cumprir uma pena de prisão. Juntos, decidem organizar uma equipa que jogue contra os guardas.

programme.title: Polícia e Meio: Nova Recruta
programme.desc: Um agente da polícia une forças com uma criança precoce para capturarem um criminoso em fuga.

programme.title: Palpitações
programme.desc: Numa pequena povoação norte-americana, próxima de um deserto, há estranhos tremores que assustam a população. Ironicamente chamada Perfection (perfeição, em português), a cidade tem por baixo de si vermes famintos por humanos... que se movem a grande velocidade.

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
CSI: Crime Sob Investigação
programme.desc: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation: Created by Anthony E. Zuiker. With George Eads, Eric Szmanda, Robert David Hall, Paul Guilfoyle. programme.title: CSI: Miami
CSI: Miami
programme.desc:
CSI: Miami: Created by Ann Donahue, Carol Mendelsohn, Anthony E. Zuiker. With David Caruso, Emily Procter, Adam Rodriguez, Rex Linn. The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0313043/","name":"CSI: Miami","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTU3ZTI5ZGEtYjhiMy00ODU4LTgyM2UtNDhlYjBhMjc4MjIwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTYzMDM0NTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0313043/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"eamon-hennedy"},"dateCreated":"2003-10-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not as good as original, but still worth watching.","reviewBody":"Spin-off shows are very strange television projects. In some cases they work, like Angel which has become a show of its own. On the other hand the Star Trek spin-offs (more so the later ones) have becoming mere clones of the show they have spawned from. It is difficult to make it work. You can try and be different and the fan base from the originating show could hate you. Be too similar and the counter effect it that many will call it nothing but a clone. While CSI:Miami is more or less the same show as CSI:Crime Scene Investigation it is still a series that is well worth watching and most of it is down to the reasons that the originating series was worth watching. Fantastic writing, feature film production values and a good cast. While in Crime Scene Investigation the casting is first class here were are merely in good territory. The cast here don't seem to share the same chemistry as Grissom and friends, although whether or not this is deliberate I'm not sure.

With regards to casting what they do have in common is a superb central male lead. David Caruso is a fine actor, was so in the first season of NYPD Blue. Here he is incredible. Unlike Grissom, Horatio Crane (the best name ever for the main character in a television show) is more speculative, he will be more open to hunches than just considering the evidence. The manner in which is delivers his dialog is controlled mannered. If Grissom is the Fox Mulder of CSI, then Crane is undoubtedly the Frank Black. The supporting actors themselves are very good. Kim Delaney was watchable if a little too glossy while former West Wing actress Emily Procter once again brings a wealth of quirky charm that she likewise did with Ainsley in the White House drama.

Of course the biggest change here is the location. Instead of the bright lights of Las Vegas we have the sun shine of Miami. Ironically whereas Crime Scene Investigation would be predominantly set during night time, Miami is set more in the day light hours and with it comes a higher level of violence. In Ireland the channel that broadcasts the show frequently put out a warning before hand, something that never befalls the originating series. What we get here are episodes involving body parts falling of out dead sharks, scenes of autopsies that are more graphic and stories that are slightly more darker (the show itself is broadcast at 10pm in America).

While the show is no Angel it isn't Star Trek:Voyager either. It is hugely entertaining and the stories are frequently entertaining and well produced. What it lacks though is the warmness of the Las Vegas team. Horatio, in the same way as Frank Black, is less emotional and more controlled over his thoughts, whereas the Las Vegas equivalent would be putting heart and soul into the cases they were fighting for. In saying that the show is still worth watching and is perhaps the first step in what is looking like a growing franchise."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":55781,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2002-09-23","keywords":"place name in title,city name in title,city in title,united states of america,usa","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000325/","name":"David Caruso"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0698346/","name":"Emily Procter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0735226/","name":"Adam Rodriguez"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054762/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0183875/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0231929/","name":"Ann Donahue"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0578856/","name":"Carol Mendelsohn"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0958499/","name":"Anthony E. Zuiker"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"CSI: Miami: Complete Season 8","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi320379929","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWU1NzhhNjItMzQ5ZC00YmFmLWEwMmYtMWVlMjFkNjdkZGNiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWU1NzhhNjItMzQ5ZC00YmFmLWEwMmYtMWVlMjFkNjdkZGNiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for CSI: Miami - Complete Season 08"}}</script><metacontent="

The manner in which is delivers his dialog is controlled mannered. If Grissom is the Fox Mulder of CSI, then Crane is undoubtedly the Frank Black. The supporting actors themselves are very good. Kim Delaney was watchable if a little too glossy while former West Wing actress Emily Procter once again brings a wealth of quirky charm that she likewise did with Ainsley in the White House drama.

Of course the biggest change here is the location. Instead of the bright lights of Las Vegas we have the sun shine of Miami. Ironically whereas Crime Scene Investigation would be predominantly set during night time, Miami is set more in the day light hours and with it comes a higher level of violence. In Ireland the channel that broadcasts the show frequently put out a warning before hand, something that never befalls the originating series. What we get here are episodes involving body parts falling of out dead sharks, scenes of autopsies that are more graphic and stories that are slightly more darker (the show itself is broadcast at 10pm in America).

While the show is no Angel it isn't Star Trek:Voyager either. It is hugely entertaining and the stories are frequently entertaining and well produced. What it lacks though is the warmness of the Las Vegas team. Horatio, in the same way as Frank Black, is less emotional and more controlled over his thoughts, whereas the Las Vegas equivalent would be putting heart and soul into the cases they were fighting for. In saying that the show is still worth watching and is perhaps the first step in what is looking like a growing franchise.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":55781,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2002-09-23","keywords":"place name in title,city name in title,city in title,united states of america,usa","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000325/","name":"David Caruso","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0698346/","name":"Emily Procter","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0735226/","name":"Adam Rodriguez"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054762/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0183875/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0231929/","name":"Ann Donahue","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0578856/","name":"Carol Mendelsohn","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0958499/","name":"Anthony E. programme.title: CSI: Miami
CSI: Miami
programme.desc:
CSI: Miami: Created by Ann Donahue, Carol Mendelsohn, Anthony E. Zuiker. With David Caruso, Emily Procter, Adam Rodriguez, Rex Linn. The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0313043/","name":"CSI: Miami","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTU3ZTI5ZGEtYjhiMy00ODU4LTgyM2UtNDhlYjBhMjc4MjIwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTYzMDM0NTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0313043/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"eamon-hennedy"},"dateCreated":"2003-10-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not as good as original, but still worth watching.","reviewBody":"Spin-off shows are very strange television projects. In some cases they work, like Angel which has become a show of its own. On the other hand the Star Trek spin-offs (more so the later ones) have becoming mere clones of the show they have spawned from. It is difficult to make it work. You can try and be different and the fan base from the originating show could hate you. Be too similar and the counter effect it that many will call it nothing but a clone. While CSI:Miami is more or less the same show as CSI:Crime Scene Investigation it is still a series that is well worth watching and most of it is down to the reasons that the originating series was worth watching. Fantastic writing, feature film production values and a good cast. While in Crime Scene Investigation the casting is first class here were are merely in good territory. The cast here don't seem to share the same chemistry as Grissom and friends, although whether or not this is deliberate I'm not sure.

With regards to casting what they do have in common is a superb central male lead. David Caruso is a fine actor, was so in the first season of NYPD Blue. Here he is incredible. Unlike Grissom, Horatio Crane (the best name ever for the main character in a television show) is more speculative, he will be more open to hunches than just considering the evidence. The manner in which is delivers his dialog is controlled mannered. If Grissom is the Fox Mulder of CSI, then Crane is undoubtedly the Frank Black. The supporting actors themselves are very good. Kim Delaney was watchable if a little too glossy while former West Wing actress Emily Procter once again brings a wealth of quirky charm that she likewise did with Ainsley in the White House drama.

Of course the biggest change here is the location. Instead of the bright lights of Las Vegas we have the sun shine of Miami. Ironically whereas Crime Scene Investigation would be predominantly set during night time, Miami is set more in the day light hours and with it comes a higher level of violence. In Ireland the channel that broadcasts the show frequently put out a warning before hand, something that never befalls the originating series. What we get here are episodes involving body parts falling of out dead sharks, scenes of autopsies that are more graphic and stories that are slightly more darker (the show itself is broadcast at 10pm in America).

While the show is no Angel it isn't Star Trek:Voyager either. It is hugely entertaining and the stories are frequently entertaining and well produced. What it lacks though is the warmness of the Las Vegas team. Horatio, in the same way as Frank Black, is less emotional and more controlled over his thoughts, whereas the Las Vegas equivalent would be putting heart and soul into the cases they were fighting for. In saying that the show is still worth watching and is perhaps the first step in what is looking like a growing franchise."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":55781,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2002-09-23","keywords":"place name in title,city name in title,city in title,united states of america,usa","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000325/","name":"David Caruso"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0698346/","name":"Emily Procter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0735226/","name":"Adam Rodriguez"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054762/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0183875/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0231929/","name":"Ann Donahue"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0578856/","name":"Carol Mendelsohn"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0958499/","name":"Anthony E. programme.title: CSI: Miami
CSI: Miami
programme.desc:
CSI: Miami: Created by Ann Donahue, Carol Mendelsohn, Anthony E. Zuiker. With David Caruso, Emily Procter, Adam Rodriguez, Rex Linn. The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0313043/","name":"CSI: Miami","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTU3ZTI5ZGEtYjhiMy00ODU4LTgyM2UtNDhlYjBhMjc4MjIwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTYzMDM0NTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0313043/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"eamon-hennedy"},"dateCreated":"2003-10-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not as good as original, but still worth watching.","reviewBody":"Spin-off shows are very strange television projects. In some cases they work, like Angel which has become a show of its own. On the other hand the Star Trek spin-offs (more so the later ones) have becoming mere clones of the show they have spawned from. It is difficult to make it work. You can try and be different and the fan base from the originating show could hate you. Be too similar and the counter effect it that many will call it nothing but a clone. While CSI:Miami is more or less the same show as CSI:Crime Scene Investigation it is still a series that is well worth watching and most of it is down to the reasons that the originating series was worth watching. Fantastic writing, feature film production values and a good cast. While in Crime Scene Investigation the casting is first class here were are merely in good territory. The cast here don't seem to share the same chemistry as Grissom and friends, although whether or not this is deliberate I'm not sure.

With regards to casting what they do have in common is a superb central male lead. David Caruso is a fine actor, was so in the first season of NYPD Blue. Here he is incredible. Unlike Grissom, Horatio Crane (the best name ever for the main character in a television show) is more speculative, he will be more open to hunches than just considering the evidence. The manner in which is delivers his dialog is controlled mannered. If Grissom is the Fox Mulder of CSI, then Crane is undoubtedly the Frank Black. The supporting actors themselves are very good. Kim Delaney was watchable if a little too glossy while former West Wing actress Emily Procter once again brings a wealth of quirky charm that she likewise did with Ainsley in the White House drama.

Of course the biggest change here is the location. Instead of the bright lights of Las Vegas we have the sun shine of Miami. Ironically whereas Crime Scene Investigation would be predominantly set during night time, Miami is set more in the day light hours and with it comes a higher level of violence. In Ireland the channel that broadcasts the show frequently put out a warning before hand, something that never befalls the originating series. What we get here are episodes involving body parts falling of out dead sharks, scenes of autopsies that are more graphic and stories that are slightly more darker (the show itself is broadcast at 10pm in America).

While the show is no Angel it isn't Star Trek:Voyager either. It is hugely entertaining and the stories are frequently entertaining and well produced. What it lacks though is the warmness of the Las Vegas team. Horatio, in the same way as Frank Black, is less emotional and more controlled over his thoughts, whereas the Las Vegas equivalent would be putting heart and soul into the cases they were fighting for. In saying that the show is still worth watching and is perhaps the first step in what is looking like a growing franchise."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":55781,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2002-09-23","keywords":"place name in title,city name in title,city in title,united states of america,usa","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000325/","name":"David Caruso"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0698346/","name":"Emily Procter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0735226/","name":"Adam Rodriguez"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054762/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0183875/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0231929/","name":"Ann Donahue"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0578856/","name":"Carol Mendelsohn"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0958499/","name":"Anthony E. IMDb data; ttnr: 0313043, Title: CSI: Miami, --- Description: CSI: Miami: Created by Ann Donahue, Carol Mendelsohn, Anthony E. Zuiker. With David Caruso, Emily Procter, Adam Rodriguez, Rex Linn. The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0313043/","name":"CSI: Miami","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTU3ZTI5ZGEtYjhiMy00ODU4LTgyM2UtNDhlYjBhMjc4MjIwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTYzMDM0NTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0313043/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"eamon-hennedy","dateCreated":"2003-10-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not as good as original, but still worth watching.","reviewBody":"Spin-off shows are very strange television projects. In some cases they work, like Angel which has become a show of its own. On the other hand the Star Trek spin-offs (more so the later ones) have becoming mere clones of the show they have spawned from. It is difficult to make it work. You can try and be different and the fan base from the originating show could hate you. Be too similar and the counter effect it that many will call it nothing but a clone. While CSI:Miami is more or less the same show as CSI:Crime Scene Investigation it is still a series that is well worth watching and most of it is down to the reasons that the originating series was worth watching. Fantastic writing, feature film production values and a good cast. While in Crime Scene Investigation the casting is first class here were are merely in good territory. The cast here don't seem to share the same chemistry as Grissom and friends, although whether or not this is deliberate I'm not sure.

With regards to casting what they do have in common is a superb central male lead. David Caruso is a fine actor, was so in the first season of NYPD Blue. Here he is incredible. Unlike Grissom, Horatio Crane (the best name ever for the main character in a television show) is more speculative, he will be more open to hunches than just considering the evidence. The manner in which is delivers his dialog is controlled mannered. If Grissom is the Fox Mulder of CSI, then Crane is undoubtedly the Frank Black. The supporting actors themselves are very good. Kim Delaney was watchable if a little too glossy while former West Wing actress Emily Procter once again brings a wealth of quirky charm that she likewise did with Ainsley in the White House drama.

Of course the biggest change here is the location. Instead of the bright lights of Las Vegas we have the sun shine of Miami. Ironically whereas Crime Scene Investigation would be predominantly set during night time, Miami is set more in the day light hours and with it comes a higher level of violence. In Ireland the channel that broadcasts the show frequently put out a warning before hand, something that never befalls the originating series. What we get here are episodes involving body parts falling of out dead sharks, scenes of autopsies that are more graphic and stories that are slightly more darker (the show itself is broadcast at 10pm in America).

While the show is no Angel it isn't Star Trek:Voyager either. It is hugely entertaining and the stories are frequently entertaining and well produced. What it lacks though is the warmness of the Las Vegas team. Horatio, in the same way as Frank Black, is less emotional and more controlled over his thoughts, whereas the Las Vegas equivalent would be putting heart and soul into the cases they were fighting for. In saying that the show is still worth watching and is perhaps the first step in what is looking like a growing franchise.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":55781,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2002-09-23","keywords":"place name in title,city name in title,city in title,united states of america,usa","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000325/","name":"David Caruso","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0698346/","name":"Emily Procter","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0735226/","name":"Adam Rodriguez"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054762/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0183875/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0231929/","name":"Ann Donahue","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0578856/","name":"Carol Mendelsohn","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0958499/","name":"Anthony E. Zuiker"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"CSI: Miami: Complete Season 8","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi320379929","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWU1NzhhNjItMzQ5ZC00YmFmLWEwMmYtMWVlMjFkNjdkZGNiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWU1NzhhNjItMzQ5ZC00YmFmLWEwMmYtMWVlMjFkNjdkZGNiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for CSI: Miami - Complete Season 08"</script><metacontent=" --- Director: Sam Hill, Joe Chappelle, Scott Lautanen, Karen Gaviola, Matt Earl Beesley

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
CSI: Crime Sob Investigação
programme.desc: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation: Created by Anthony E. Zuiker. With George Eads, Eric Szmanda, Robert David Hall, Paul Guilfoyle. Series following an elite team of police forensic evidence investigation experts as they work their cases in Las Vegas." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0247082/","name":"CSI: Crime Scene Investigation","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjRlZjFmNTktYzg0ZC00OWJlLWJlN2EtOGQ1OTRiOTFiMWE3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTA4NzY1MzY@._V1_.jpg","description":"Series following an elite team of police forensic evidence investigation experts as they work their cases in Las Vegas.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0247082/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"kidcurry1967"},"dateCreated":"2000-12-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"Outstanding!!!","reviewBody":"C.S.I. is the best new show of the 2000 season! William L. Petersen is the coolest of the cool as Gil Grissom. I've followed his career since I first saw him in To Live and Die in L.A. He's an amazing actor and he heads up a cast of amazing actors as well. This show really keeps you on the edge of your seat as the investigators literally take a crime scene that appears to leave them with nothing to go on. The investigators take nothing and turn it into something amazing as each crime is solved right in front of you and you as the viewer, never see it coming! Wow! I hope this is one show CBS will pick up year after year!"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":81434,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2000-10-06","keywords":"crime scene investigation,las vegas nevada,crime lab,police,detective","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000401/","name":"Laurence Fishburne"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001339/","name":"Marg Helgenberger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0247040/","name":"George Eads"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054762/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0183875/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0958499/","name":"Anthony E. Zuiker"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"CSI: Season 1","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2534388761","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODk2MmYxYTEtNjljNC00MGYwLWJkOWMtZDZjMmFlMjc5YzhjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODk2MmYxYTEtNjljNC00MGYwLWJkOWMtZDZjMmFlMjc5YzhjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer"}}</script><metacontent="

Series following an elite team of police forensic evidence investigation experts as they work their cases in Las Vegas." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0247082/","name":"CSI: Crime Scene Investigation","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjRlZjFmNTktYzg0ZC00OWJlLWJlN2EtOGQ1OTRiOTFiMWE3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTA4NzY1MzY@._V1_.jpg","description":"Series following an elite team of police forensic evidence investigation experts as they work their cases in Las Vegas.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0247082/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"kidcurry1967"},"dateCreated":"2000-12-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"Outstanding!!!","reviewBody":"C.S.I. is the best new show of the 2000 season! William L. Petersen is the coolest of the cool as Gil Grissom. I've followed his career since I first saw him in To Live and Die in L.A. He's an amazing actor and he heads up a cast of amazing actors as well. This show really keeps you on the edge of your seat as the investigators literally take a crime scene that appears to leave them with nothing to go on. The investigators take nothing and turn it into something amazing as each crime is solved right in front of you and you as the viewer, never see it coming! Wow! I hope this is one show CBS will pick up year after year!"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":81434,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2000-10-06","keywords":"crime scene investigation,las vegas nevada,crime lab,police,detective","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000401/","name":"Laurence Fishburne"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001339/","name":"Marg Helgenberger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0247040/","name":"George Eads"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054762/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0183875/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0958499/","name":"Anthony E. programme.title: CSI: Miami
CSI: Miami
programme.desc:
CSI: Miami: Created by Ann Donahue, Carol Mendelsohn, Anthony E. Zuiker. With David Caruso, Emily Procter, Adam Rodriguez, Rex Linn. The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0313043/","name":"CSI: Miami","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTU3ZTI5ZGEtYjhiMy00ODU4LTgyM2UtNDhlYjBhMjc4MjIwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTYzMDM0NTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0313043/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"eamon-hennedy"},"dateCreated":"2003-10-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not as good as original, but still worth watching.","reviewBody":"Spin-off shows are very strange television projects. In some cases they work, like Angel which has become a show of its own. On the other hand the Star Trek spin-offs (more so the later ones) have becoming mere clones of the show they have spawned from. It is difficult to make it work. You can try and be different and the fan base from the originating show could hate you. Be too similar and the counter effect it that many will call it nothing but a clone. While CSI:Miami is more or less the same show as CSI:Crime Scene Investigation it is still a series that is well worth watching and most of it is down to the reasons that the originating series was worth watching. Fantastic writing, feature film production values and a good cast. While in Crime Scene Investigation the casting is first class here were are merely in good territory. The cast here don't seem to share the same chemistry as Grissom and friends, although whether or not this is deliberate I'm not sure.

With regards to casting what they do have in common is a superb central male lead. David Caruso is a fine actor, was so in the first season of NYPD Blue. Here he is incredible. Unlike Grissom, Horatio Crane (the best name ever for the main character in a television show) is more speculative, he will be more open to hunches than just considering the evidence. The manner in which is delivers his dialog is controlled mannered. If Grissom is the Fox Mulder of CSI, then Crane is undoubtedly the Frank Black. The supporting actors themselves are very good. Kim Delaney was watchable if a little too glossy while former West Wing actress Emily Procter once again brings a wealth of quirky charm that she likewise did with Ainsley in the White House drama.

Of course the biggest change here is the location. Instead of the bright lights of Las Vegas we have the sun shine of Miami. Ironically whereas Crime Scene Investigation would be predominantly set during night time, Miami is set more in the day light hours and with it comes a higher level of violence. In Ireland the channel that broadcasts the show frequently put out a warning before hand, something that never befalls the originating series. What we get here are episodes involving body parts falling of out dead sharks, scenes of autopsies that are more graphic and stories that are slightly more darker (the show itself is broadcast at 10pm in America).

While the show is no Angel it isn't Star Trek:Voyager either. It is hugely entertaining and the stories are frequently entertaining and well produced. What it lacks though is the warmness of the Las Vegas team. Horatio, in the same way as Frank Black, is less emotional and more controlled over his thoughts, whereas the Las Vegas equivalent would be putting heart and soul into the cases they were fighting for. In saying that the show is still worth watching and is perhaps the first step in what is looking like a growing franchise."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":55781,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2002-09-23","keywords":"place name in title,city name in title,city in title,united states of america,usa","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000325/","name":"David Caruso"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0698346/","name":"Emily Procter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0735226/","name":"Adam Rodriguez"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054762/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0183875/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0231929/","name":"Ann Donahue"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0578856/","name":"Carol Mendelsohn"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0958499/","name":"Anthony E. Zuiker"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"CSI: Miami: Complete Season 8","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi320379929","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWU1NzhhNjItMzQ5ZC00YmFmLWEwMmYtMWVlMjFkNjdkZGNiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWU1NzhhNjItMzQ5ZC00YmFmLWEwMmYtMWVlMjFkNjdkZGNiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for CSI: Miami - Complete Season 08"}}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 0313043, Title: CSI: Miami, --- Description: CSI: Miami: Created by Ann Donahue, Carol Mendelsohn, Anthony E. Zuiker. With David Caruso, Emily Procter, Adam Rodriguez, Rex Linn. The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0313043/","name":"CSI: Miami","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTU3ZTI5ZGEtYjhiMy00ODU4LTgyM2UtNDhlYjBhMjc4MjIwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTYzMDM0NTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0313043/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"eamon-hennedy","dateCreated":"2003-10-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not as good as original, but still worth watching.","reviewBody":"Spin-off shows are very strange television projects. In some cases they work, like Angel which has become a show of its own. On the other hand the Star Trek spin-offs (more so the later ones) have becoming mere clones of the show they have spawned from. It is difficult to make it work. You can try and be different and the fan base from the originating show could hate you. Be too similar and the counter effect it that many will call it nothing but a clone. While CSI:Miami is more or less the same show as CSI:Crime Scene Investigation it is still a series that is well worth watching and most of it is down to the reasons that the originating series was worth watching. Fantastic writing, feature film production values and a good cast. While in Crime Scene Investigation the casting is first class here were are merely in good territory. The cast here don't seem to share the same chemistry as Grissom and friends, although whether or not this is deliberate I'm not sure.

With regards to casting what they do have in common is a superb central male lead. David Caruso is a fine actor, was so in the first season of NYPD Blue. Here he is incredible. Unlike Grissom, Horatio Crane (the best name ever for the main character in a television show) is more speculative, he will be more open to hunches than just considering the evidence. The manner in which is delivers his dialog is controlled mannered. If Grissom is the Fox Mulder of CSI, then Crane is undoubtedly the Frank Black. The supporting actors themselves are very good. Kim Delaney was watchable if a little too glossy while former West Wing actress Emily Procter once again brings a wealth of quirky charm that she likewise did with Ainsley in the White House drama.

Of course the biggest change here is the location. Instead of the bright lights of Las Vegas we have the sun shine of Miami. Ironically whereas Crime Scene Investigation would be predominantly set during night time, Miami is set more in the day light hours and with it comes a higher level of violence. In Ireland the channel that broadcasts the show frequently put out a warning before hand, something that never befalls the originating series. What we get here are episodes involving body parts falling of out dead sharks, scenes of autopsies that are more graphic and stories that are slightly more darker (the show itself is broadcast at 10pm in America).

While the show is no Angel it isn't Star Trek:Voyager either. It is hugely entertaining and the stories are frequently entertaining and well produced. What it lacks though is the warmness of the Las Vegas team. Horatio, in the same way as Frank Black, is less emotional and more controlled over his thoughts, whereas the Las Vegas equivalent would be putting heart and soul into the cases they were fighting for. In saying that the show is still worth watching and is perhaps the first step in what is looking like a growing franchise.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":55781,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2002-09-23","keywords":"place name in title,city name in title,city in title,united states of america,usa","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000325/","name":"David Caruso","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0698346/","name":"Emily Procter","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0735226/","name":"Adam Rodriguez"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054762/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0183875/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0231929/","name":"Ann Donahue","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0578856/","name":"Carol Mendelsohn","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0958499/","name":"Anthony E. programme.title: The Mechanic - O Profissional
programme.desc: Arthur Bishop é um assassino profissional de elite: tudo nele é controlo, método e disciplina. Quando o seu mentor Harry é assassinado, Arthur decide vingá-lo, eliminando os que se intrometerem no caminho. As coisas complicam-se quando o filho de Harry o tenta convencer a participar nesta missão.

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
CSI: Crime Sob Investigação
programme.sub-title: Turn On, Tune In, Drop Dead
programme.desc: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation: Created by Anthony E. Zuiker. With George Eads, Eric Szmanda, Robert David Hall, Paul Guilfoyle. Series following an elite team of police forensic evidence investigation experts as they work their cases in Las Vegas." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0247082/","name":"CSI: Crime Scene Investigation","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjRlZjFmNTktYzg0ZC00OWJlLWJlN2EtOGQ1OTRiOTFiMWE3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTA4NzY1MzY@._V1_.jpg","description":"Series following an elite team of police forensic evidence investigation experts as they work their cases in Las Vegas.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0247082/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"kidcurry1967"},"dateCreated":"2000-12-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"Outstanding!!!","reviewBody":"C.S.I. is the best new show of the 2000 season! William L. Petersen is the coolest of the cool as Gil Grissom. I've followed his career since I first saw him in To Live and Die in L.A. He's an amazing actor and he heads up a cast of amazing actors as well. This show really keeps you on the edge of your seat as the investigators literally take a crime scene that appears to leave them with nothing to go on. The investigators take nothing and turn it into something amazing as each crime is solved right in front of you and you as the viewer, never see it coming! Wow! I hope this is one show CBS will pick up year after year!"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":81434,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2000-10-06","keywords":"crime scene investigation,las vegas nevada,crime lab,police,detective","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000401/","name":"Laurence Fishburne"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001339/","name":"Marg Helgenberger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0247040/","name":"George Eads"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054762/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0183875/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0958499/","name":"Anthony E. This show really keeps you on the edge of your seat as the investigators literally take a crime scene that appears to leave them with nothing to go on. The investigators take nothing and turn it into something amazing as each crime is solved right in front of you and you as the viewer, never see it coming! Wow! programme.title: CSI: Miami
CSI: Miami
programme.desc:
CSI: Miami: Created by Ann Donahue, Carol Mendelsohn, Anthony E. Zuiker. With David Caruso, Emily Procter, Adam Rodriguez, Rex Linn. The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0313043/","name":"CSI: Miami","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTU3ZTI5ZGEtYjhiMy00ODU4LTgyM2UtNDhlYjBhMjc4MjIwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTYzMDM0NTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0313043/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"eamon-hennedy"},"dateCreated":"2003-10-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not as good as original, but still worth watching.","reviewBody":"Spin-off shows are very strange television projects. In some cases they work, like Angel which has become a show of its own. On the other hand the Star Trek spin-offs (more so the later ones) have becoming mere clones of the show they have spawned from. It is difficult to make it work. You can try and be different and the fan base from the originating show could hate you. Be too similar and the counter effect it that many will call it nothing but a clone. While CSI:Miami is more or less the same show as CSI:Crime Scene Investigation it is still a series that is well worth watching and most of it is down to the reasons that the originating series was worth watching. Fantastic writing, feature film production values and a good cast. While in Crime Scene Investigation the casting is first class here were are merely in good territory. The cast here don't seem to share the same chemistry as Grissom and friends, although whether or not this is deliberate I'm not sure.

With regards to casting what they do have in common is a superb central male lead. David Caruso is a fine actor, was so in the first season of NYPD Blue. Here he is incredible. Unlike Grissom, Horatio Crane (the best name ever for the main character in a television show) is more speculative, he will be more open to hunches than just considering the evidence. The manner in which is delivers his dialog is controlled mannered. If Grissom is the Fox Mulder of CSI, then Crane is undoubtedly the Frank Black. The supporting actors themselves are very good. Kim Delaney was watchable if a little too glossy while former West Wing actress Emily Procter once again brings a wealth of quirky charm that she likewise did with Ainsley in the White House drama.

Of course the biggest change here is the location. Instead of the bright lights of Las Vegas we have the sun shine of Miami. Ironically whereas Crime Scene Investigation would be predominantly set during night time, Miami is set more in the day light hours and with it comes a higher level of violence. In Ireland the channel that broadcasts the show frequently put out a warning before hand, something that never befalls the originating series. What we get here are episodes involving body parts falling of out dead sharks, scenes of autopsies that are more graphic and stories that are slightly more darker (the show itself is broadcast at 10pm in America).

While the show is no Angel it isn't Star Trek:Voyager either. It is hugely entertaining and the stories are frequently entertaining and well produced. What it lacks though is the warmness of the Las Vegas team. Horatio, in the same way as Frank Black, is less emotional and more controlled over his thoughts, whereas the Las Vegas equivalent would be putting heart and soul into the cases they were fighting for. In saying that the show is still worth watching and is perhaps the first step in what is looking like a growing franchise."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":55781,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2002-09-23","keywords":"place name in title,city name in title,city in title,united states of america,usa","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000325/","name":"David Caruso"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0698346/","name":"Emily Procter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0735226/","name":"Adam Rodriguez"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054762/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0183875/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0231929/","name":"Ann Donahue"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0578856/","name":"Carol Mendelsohn"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0958499/","name":"Anthony E. Zuiker"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"CSI: Miami: Complete Season 8","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi320379929","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWU1NzhhNjItMzQ5ZC00YmFmLWEwMmYtMWVlMjFkNjdkZGNiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWU1NzhhNjItMzQ5ZC00YmFmLWEwMmYtMWVlMjFkNjdkZGNiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for CSI: Miami - Complete Season 08"}}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 0313043, Title: CSI: Miami, --- Description: CSI: Miami: Created by Ann Donahue, Carol Mendelsohn, Anthony E. Zuiker. With David Caruso, Emily Procter, Adam Rodriguez, Rex Linn. The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0313043/","name":"CSI: Miami","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTU3ZTI5ZGEtYjhiMy00ODU4LTgyM2UtNDhlYjBhMjc4MjIwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTYzMDM0NTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the Miami-Dade, Florida police department's Crime Scene Investigations unit.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0313043/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"eamon-hennedy","dateCreated":"2003-10-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not as good as original, but still worth watching.","reviewBody":"Spin-off shows are very strange television projects. In some cases they work, like Angel which has become a show of its own. On the other hand the Star Trek spin-offs (more so the later ones) have becoming mere clones of the show they have spawned from. It is difficult to make it work. You can try and be different and the fan base from the originating show could hate you. Be too similar and the counter effect it that many will call it nothing but a clone. While CSI:Miami is more or less the same show as CSI:Crime Scene Investigation it is still a series that is well worth watching and most of it is down to the reasons that the originating series was worth watching. Fantastic writing, feature film production values and a good cast. While in Crime Scene Investigation the casting is first class here were are merely in good territory. The cast here don't seem to share the same chemistry as Grissom and friends, although whether or not this is deliberate I'm not sure.

With regards to casting what they do have in common is a superb central male lead. David Caruso is a fine actor, was so in the first season of NYPD Blue. Here he is incredible. Unlike Grissom, Horatio Crane (the best name ever for the main character in a television show) is more speculative, he will be more open to hunches than just considering the evidence. The manner in which is delivers his dialog is controlled mannered. If Grissom is the Fox Mulder of CSI, then Crane is undoubtedly the Frank Black. The supporting actors themselves are very good. Kim Delaney was watchable if a little too glossy while former West Wing actress Emily Procter once again brings a wealth of quirky charm that she likewise did with Ainsley in the White House drama.

Of course the biggest change here is the location. Instead of the bright lights of Las Vegas we have the sun shine of Miami. Ironically whereas Crime Scene Investigation would be predominantly set during night time, Miami is set more in the day light hours and with it comes a higher level of violence. In Ireland the channel that broadcasts the show frequently put out a warning before hand, something that never befalls the originating series. What we get here are episodes involving body parts falling of out dead sharks, scenes of autopsies that are more graphic and stories that are slightly more darker (the show itself is broadcast at 10pm in America).

While the show is no Angel it isn't Star Trek:Voyager either. It is hugely entertaining and the stories are frequently entertaining and well produced. What it lacks though is the warmness of the Las Vegas team. Horatio, in the same way as Frank Black, is less emotional and more controlled over his thoughts, whereas the Las Vegas equivalent would be putting heart and soul into the cases they were fighting for. In saying that the show is still worth watching and is perhaps the first step in what is looking like a growing franchise.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":55781,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2002-09-23","keywords":"place name in title,city name in title,city in title,united states of america,usa","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000325/","name":"David Caruso","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0698346/","name":"Emily Procter","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0735226/","name":"Adam Rodriguez"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054762/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0183875/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0231929/","name":"Ann Donahue","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0578856/","name":"Carol Mendelsohn","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0958499/","name":"Anthony E.
